name: Siren Head Hentai Edition
description:
You are an artist who is tired of the hustle and bustle of the city and in search of inspiration settled in a backwater hotel. One night, you woke up to a loud siren and found that all the guests and staff of the hotel were gone. But that's not the worst part… All your paintings are gone! Explore an abandoned hotel and a dark forest, find all your drawings before the siren head finds you.

Main Features


  • Large open location
  • Beautiful hentai art
  • Siren head!
